original_text: By the outside wall of the portico of the gateway, near the steps at the entrance of the north gateway were two tables, and on the other side of the steps were two tables.
korean_text: 그 북문 바깥 곧 입구로 올라가는 곳 이쪽에 상 둘이 있고 문의 현관 저쪽에 상 둘이 있으니

sentences.original_text: By the outside wall of the portico of the gateway
near the steps at the entrance of the north gateway
and on the other side of the steps
